data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiRecon ACI - 2.0.0
data.description: FortiRecon is a Digital Risk Protection Service (DRPS) product that provides an outside-the-network view to the risks posed to your enterprise.The Adversary Centric Intelligence (ACI) module leverages FortiGuard Threat Analysts to provide comprehensive coverage of dark web, open source, and technical threat intelligence, including threat actor insights. This information enables administrators to proactively assess risks, respond faster to incidents, better understand their attackers, and protect assets. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to ACI

workflows.name: FortiSOAR Threat Intel Feeds Using Threat Intel Report > Create
workflows.description: Create threat intel reports and it's associated ioc as FortiSOAR threat intel feeds

arguments.reputation_map: {'Good': "{{'IndicatorReputation' | picklist('Good', 'uuid')}}",'Suspicious': "{{'IndicatorReputation' | picklist('Suspicious', 'uuid')}}",'Malicious': "{{'IndicatorReputation' | picklist('Malicious', 'uuid')}}",'No Reputation Available': "{{'IndicatorReputation' | picklist('No Reputation Available', 'uuid')}}",'TBD': "{{'IndicatorReputation' | picklist('TBD', 'uuid')}}"}
arguments.source_category_type_map:
{
	"Media Trends": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("Media Trends")}}",
	"Darknet": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("Darknet")}}",
	"Humint": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("Humint")}}",
	"OSINT": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("OSINT")}}",
	"Fraudulent Domains": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("Fraudulent Domains")}}",
	"Technical Intelligence": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("Technical Intelligence")}}",
	"Executive Summary": "{{"Source Category" | picklist("Executive Summary")}}"
}
arguments.threat_intel_feed_type_map:
{
"hash": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("FileHash")}}",
"url": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("URL")}}",
"ip": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("IP Address")}}",
"file_name, file_path": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("Filename")}}",
"DOMAIN, domain": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("Domain")}}",
"email": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("Email Address")}}",
"registry_key": "{{"ThreatIntelFeedType" | picklist("Registry")}}"
}
arguments.source_reliability_type_map:
{
  	"A-Reliable": "{{"Source Reliability" | picklist("Reliable")}}",
  	"B-Usually reliable": "{{"Source Reliability" | picklist("Usually Reliable")}}",
  	"C-Fairly reliable": "{{"Source Reliability" | picklist("Fairly Reliable")}}",
  	"D-Not usually reliable": "{{"Source Reliability" | picklist("Not Usually Reliable")}}",
  	"E-Unreliable": "{{"Source Reliability" | picklist("Unreliable")}}",
  	"F-Cannot be judged": "{{"Source Reliability" | picklist("Cannot Judged")}}"
}
arguments.information_reliability_type_map:
{
	"1-Confirmed": "{{"Information Reliability" | picklist("Confirmed")}}",
	"2-Probably true": "{{"Information Reliability" | picklist("Probably True")}}",
	"3-Possibly true": "{{"Information Reliability" | picklist("Possibly True")}}",
	"4-Doubtfully true": "{{"Information Reliability" | picklist("Doubtfully True")}}",
	"5-Improbable": "{{"Information Reliability" | picklist("Improbable")}}",
	"6-Cannot be judged": "{{"Information Reliability" | picklist("Cannot Judged")}}"
}

arguments._tmp:
{% for item in  vars.steps.Get_Technical_Intelligence_Reports.data.hits %}{% set _ = vars.technical_intelligence_reports.append(item) %}{% endfor %}
{% for item in vars.steps.Fetch_Technical_Intelligence_Reports %}{% for i in item.data.hits %}{% set _ = vars.technical_intelligence_reports.append(i) %}{% endfor %}{% endfor %}

conditions.step_name: Copy of Get Technical Intelligence Reports

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Fetch Reports Since",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "date",
    "name": "last_sample_pull_time",
    "tooltip": "Select a date and time to retrieve reports after the specified time."
  },
  {
    "name": "source_category",
    "title": "Source Category",
    "type": "text",
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "required": false,
    "value": "Technical Intelligence",
    "tooltip": "Filter by specific source category. Acceptable values are: Media Trends, Darknet, Humint, OSINT, Fraudulent Domains, Technical Intelligence, Executive Summary etc. Multiple source categories should be comma separated and will work as OR filter, example: Darknet, OSINT."
  },
  {
    "title": "Confidence",
    "name": "confidence",
    "type": "integer",
    "tooltip": "Default Confidence score to be set for the ioc while creating its feed record.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 50,
    "validation": {
      "minlength": 0,
      "maxlength": 100
    }
  },
  {
    "title": "Reputation",
    "name": "reputation",
    "type": "select",
    "tooltip": "Default Reputation score to be set for the ioc while creating its feed record.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "options": [
      "Good",
      "Suspicious",
      "Malicious",
      "No Reputation Available",
      "TBD"
    ],
    "value": "Suspicious"
  },
  {
    "title": "Maximum Age (in days)",
    "name": "expiry",
    "type": "integer",
    "tooltip": "Default age to be set for the ioc while creating its feed record. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified here. If specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_until + expiry.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 7
  }
]

routes.name: Configuration -> Get Macro Value
Create Threat Intel Record -> Update Pull Time
Extract Value from Response -> Is Data Mapping
Fetch Sample Reports -> Return Sample Reports
Fetch Technical Intelligence Reports -> Get All Technical Intelligence Reports
Get All Technical Intelligence Reports -> Get Report IOCs
Get Macro Value -> Extract Value from Response
Get Report IOCs -> Create Threat Intel Record
Get Technical Intelligence Reports -> Get Total Number Pages
Get Total Number Pages -> Fetch Technical Intelligence Reports
Is Data Mapping -> Copy of Get Technical Intelligence Reports

workflows.description:
Retrieves a list of all reports or specific reports for the given organization ID and other input parameters you have specified from Fortinet FortiRecon ACI.
The data returned by this operation contains a list of all the filtered reports with title, summary, report URL, and the metadata related to the reports. Note that IOCs are not included in the returned data.
workflows.name: Get Reports

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiRecon ACI: Get Reports

routes.name: Start-> Get Reports

workflows.description:
Retrieves details, including IOCs, for a specific report for the given organization ID and the report ID you have specified from Fortinet FortiRecon ACI.
The data returned by this operation contains a list of all the filtered reports with title, summary, report URL, IOCs, and the metadata related to the reports.
